channel.title: United pkz devo team-Your Final Destination
channel.description:
[center][center][center][IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/34pltoi-1.jpg[/img]
Welcome to the United Pkz 317 Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.
Website- [url=http://unitedpkz.weebly.com]unitedpkz.weebly.com[/url]
Information about united pkz: We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new outlook at united pkz. I have recently just got back into dealing with private servers and I wanted to take a fresh start with a fresh base. We are looking forward to becoming part of the team, but please make sure you understand the basic idea of the server itself before applying.
Server Goals: • Create the most funnest servers ever made. • Create a large dedicated player base. • Add features that have never been seen before. • Create a genuinley coded server. • Create a staff member base that genuinely loves the game and knows how to handle problems.
Server Features: • Decent player base. • Terminated most memory leaks. • Added 3 bosses that most servers overlook. (Mutant-Tarn, Sea Troll Queen, Barrelchest) • All 614 Items • 525 Models • Added an efficient Activity Points System. • Spirit Shield effects. • Re-did NpcDrops using an event manager. • Added 2 additional Donator Ranks • Added new DH system with a manager. • All extreme potions • Overloads • Rocktail effects • Fixed prayer draining. • Quick Prayers • Added special restore potions as well as super prayer potions • Re-did Godwars. • Rs hit fades • Rs Korasi special attack • Fixed models going through players • 'Face North' • Loyalties • A LOT MORE!
Media:
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/devo1.png[/img]
more coming soon!
Positions Available:
Server Programmer (1/2) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the source itself. Must be an experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a day, with no maximum.
Forum Programmer (0/1) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the forum and site itself. Must be an experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 30 minutes a day, with no maximum.
Videographer (0/1) - A user who is knowleged and skilled with making videos of updates, as well as tutorials for the server. Must be able to output at least 1 good video a week.
Client Programmer (0/1) - A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the client itself. Must be an experienced coder, with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a day, with no maximum.
Forum Moderator (0/2) - A user who: - Works well with other users - Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users - Manages forums well - Creates a clean and safe environment for all users - Is able to punish other users - A user who does not take preference Must work a minimum of 2 hours a day, with no maximum.
In-game Moderator (0/2) - A user who: - Works well with other users - Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users - Manages game well - Must agree to and abide by the Handbook that will be given upon acception - Creates a clean and safe environment for all users - Is able to punish other users - A user who does not take preference Must work a minimum of 1-4 hours a day, with no maximum.
Application Format:
[code]Format:
Name: Age: Applying For: Experience: Proof: How active will you be: MSN/Skype:[/code] [center][/center][/center][/center][/center]

item.title: United pkz devo team-Your Final Destination
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Eddie Coder Eddie
item.description:
@Coder_Eddie wrote:

[center][center][center]

Welcome to the United Pkz 317 Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.

Website- unitedpkz.weebly.com

Information about united pkz:
We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new
outlook at united pkz. I have recently just got back into dealing with private servers and I wanted to take a fresh start with a fresh base. We are looking forward to becoming part of the team, but please make sure you understand the basic idea of the server itself before applying.

Server Goals:
• Create the most funnest servers ever made.
• Create a large dedicated player base.
• Add features that have never been seen before.
• Create a genuinley coded server.
• Create a staff member base that genuinely loves the game and knows how to handle problems.

Server Features:
• Decent player base.
• Terminated most memory leaks.
• Added 3 bosses that most servers overlook. (Mutant-Tarn, Sea Troll Queen, Barrelchest)
• All 614 Items
• 525 Models
• Added an efficient Activity Points System.
• Spirit Shield effects.
• Re-did NpcDrops using an event manager.
• Added 2 additional Donator Ranks
• Added new DH system with a manager.
• All extreme potions
• Overloads
• Rocktail effects
• Fixed prayer draining.
• Quick Prayers
• Added special restore potions as well as super prayer potions
• Re-did Godwars.
• Rs hit fades
• Rs Korasi special attack
• Fixed models going through players
• ‘Face North’
• Loyalties
• A LOT MORE!

Media:

more coming soon!

Positions Available:

Server Programmer (1/2) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the source itself. Must be an
experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

Forum Programmer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the forum and site itself. Must be an
experienced coder with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 30 minutes a
day, with no maximum.

Videographer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged and skilled with making videos of updates, as well as tutorials for the server. Must be able to output at least 1 good video a week.

Client Programmer (0/1) -
A user who is knowleged in the generality of coding the client itself. Must be an
experienced coder, with a decent amount of capability. Must work a minimum of 1 hour a
day, with no maximum.

Forum Moderator (0/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users
  • Manages forums well
  • Creates a clean and safe environment for all users
  • Is able to punish other users
  • A user who does not take preference
    Must work a minimum of 2 hours a day, with no maximum.

In-game Moderator (0/2) -
A user who:

  • Works well with other users
  • Creates simple as well as complex guides to help other users
  • Manages game well
  • Must agree to and abide by the Handbook that will be given upon acception
  • Creates a clean and safe environment for all users
  • Is able to punish other users
  • A user who does not take preference
    Must work a minimum of 1-4 hours a day, with no maximum.

Application Format:

[code]Format:

Name:
Age:
Applying For:
Experience:
Proof:
How active will you be:
MSN/Skype:[/code]
[center][/center][/center][/center][/center]

Read full topic
